name: focusatwill-hotkey
title: focus@will hotkey
description: Provides a hotkey to play/pause your focus@will tab.
author: Dan Lowe

preferences.name: hotkeyChar
preferences.title: Hotkey
preferences.description: Keypress to play/pause focus@will. Change takes effect on restart.

preferences.name: useAccelKey
preferences.title: Accel key
preferences.description: Use accel key (Mac: Command, Win/Linux: Ctrl)  Change takes effect on restart.

preferences.name: useAltKey
preferences.title: Alt key
preferences.description: Use alt key? (Mac: Option, Win: Alt). On Mac this requires a second modifier. Change takes effect on restart.

preferences.name: useShiftKey
preferences.title: Shift key
preferences.description: Use shift key?  Change takes effect on restart.

preferences.name: openNewTab
preferences.title: Open tab?
preferences.description: If focus@will is not already open, open it in a new tab?

preferences.name: pinNewTab
preferences.title: Pin tab?
preferences.description: When opening a new focus@will tab, pin the new tab?
